description: Ms. codex. Title from fol. 2b. Physical description: 15 lines per page; written in naskhi script in black on white European laid paper. Rubircation and catchwords; extensive marginal and interlinear notation. Fol. 2 damaged with some loss of text. Leaves 5-211 foliated 3-209 by a later hand. Index on fol. 1a-1b by a later hand. Text is incomplete at end.
author: Samarqandī, Muḥammad ibn Yūsuf, -1160 or 1161
extent: 211 leaves : paper ; 234 x 162 (166 x 116) mm. bound to 234 x 164 mm.
title: al-Fiqh al-nāfiʻ.
creator: سمرقندي، محمد بن يوسف.
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
binding_note: Full leather binding with blind-stamped mandorla.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
